page.title: 04HISTORICAL DRUMBLADE
page.content: There is a stone circle at Stoneyfield Farm.This consists of six stones split into two groups.I have not seen any marks or carvings on any of the stones.Rumour has it that a farmer was going to move them as he did not realise that they had any significance and this is understandable on seeing the stones. Robert the Bruce is said to have spent a night at Robin's Height near Boghead Farm. There is the ruins of a church at Brideswell. There is a War Memorial with the names of people associated with Drumblade who died in the First World War.It is a permanent reminder of how that horrific event affected all areas.
